title: House For Sale in Malabe
details:
Good Residential Property in Malabe (Swarna Place)
800 meters to Kaduwela Main Road

Two storied house consisting 6 Bed Rooms and 4 Bath Rooms, Dining room, Living area, Car Parking for 3,

Ground Floor – 03 Bed rooms & 2 Bath rooms, living area, new pantry and the dining area,
Upper Floor – 03 Bed rooms and 2 bath room with attached (including 1bath tub with 1 attached bath room) and pantry and the large dining area & balcony)

Located in calm and quiet, decent residential area

Price Rs. 42 Million (negotiable)

Please call for more information

Exclusively sold by -

PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD
351 ,DUPLICATION ROAD , (next to mahanama college )
COLOMBO 03
